line_1: No longer with the shelly Fence enclos'd;
line_2: But when their naked Bodies lie expos'd,

line_1: Where rain in clasping boughs inclos'd,

line_2: Or in the myrtle bower repos'd,

line_1: And now arriv'd where Zoan's wall inclos'd
How Great a Person it enclos'd,
line_2: To Rest he there himself compos'd,

line_1: How Great a Person it enclos'd,
line_2: How free from Danger he repos'd,

line_1: Those Groves, in Eden, ne'er inclos'd
line_2: That Pair, in Eden, ne'er repos'd,
Although one hates to be expos'd,

line_1: To secret Foes, within its Walls inclos'd?
line_2: Where your unguarded Person stands expos'd

line_1: In figur'd plots with leafy walls inclos'd,
